hemibrainr: Code for Working with Data from Janelia FlyEM's Hemibrain Project``

Source: R/hemibrainr-package.R
hemibrainr-package.Rd

Useful functions for pre-processing and analysing data from Janelia FlyEM's hemibrain project <https://www.janelia.org/project-team/flyem/hemibrain>. Data can be accessed from a neuPrint instance <https://neuprint.janelia.org/> using the R package neuprintr.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/flyconnectome/hemibrainr

  • https://flyconnectome.github.io/hemibrainr

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/flyconnectome/hemibrainr/issues
